humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the pathology report, there are no positive lymph nodes found in the regional lymph nodes (0/8 positive for metastasis). This corresponds to New Rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that 0 out of 8 regional lymph nodes were positive for metastasis (0/8). This corresponds to an N0 stage, which means there is no evidence of regional lymph node metastasis.
